Reviews.Title: “Looking for best location and honest price?”
Reviews.Author: Georgia C
Reviews.Content: looking convenient located hotelin paris des carmes option location boulevard st germain walking distance spots paris benefit don´t change price – holidays events etc book advance drawbacks cooler can´t buy champagne reasonable price refrigerator buy front grocery chill

Reviews.Title: “Delightful, well located hotel”
Reviews.Author: bac48
Reviews.Content: stay hotel des carmes latin quarter paris delighted lovely 2 star hotel located quiet street 1 minute walk nearest metro maubert lots cafes restaurants supermarket laundry nearby stayed 6 nights found staff friendly professional spoke english patient encouraging attempted converse limited french street view pantheon road bd saintgermain easy walk notre dame river free internet access organise airport shuttle plan stay trip paris

Reviews.Content: stayed leg europe trip recommendation friends loved staff lovely helpful beautiful walk 5 mins notre dame stayed superior street view roomy comfortable quiet night comfortable sleep overall stay

Reviews.Title: “A return visit - still highly recommended”
Reviews.Author: 1013WesternRanger
Reviews.Content: stay hotel october 2009 impressed cleanliness friendliness staff location hotel clean quiet comfortable hotel des carmes dont stay hotels view enjoying 5th floor view balcony pantheon hill south top notre dame shops north bathroom excellent air conditioning weather warms lift save legs stairs value breakfasts 6€

Reviews.Title: “a little treasure”

Reviews.Content: spent 7 nights late sept 2010 absolutly charmed staff friendly helpful receptionist cleaning ladies luc able kinds info visit location 5mn walking notredame 10 mn jardin du luxembourg rer 10mn walk hotel street quiet quiet interior 2 star hotel worth 5 stars louise

Reviews.Title: “Excellent 2 Star Hôtel with 5 Star Service in heart of Paris !”
Reviews.Author: Chansonette
Reviews.Content: excellent 2 star hôtel 5 star service heart paris thanks trip advisor discovered excellent comfortable hôtel heart latin quarter located 1 minutes pantheon quick walk hill boulevard st germain metro maubert 7 minute walk metro st michel close seine musée de cluny notre dame affordable restaurants cafés practical conveniences including stationery shop grocers rue des carmes dry cleaner laundromat phone store pharmacie banks post office 7 min walk rue des ecoles markets held metro maubert mornings week sell various flowers nuts variety scarves light gifts clothing beyond fine location hotel icing cake wonderful staff hard met helpful suggestions enhanced trip helped fro locations including airport efficiently superb reputation recorded trip advisor led try hôtel disappointed spoke french staff tried hard happy comfortable stay little fridge store perishable food eg picnics simple breakfast coffee tea bread croissant jam offered additional supplement comfortably furnished practical style clean beds comfortable double clean pleasant bathroom equipped bathtub separate toilet friend slept courtyard quiet time occasional eavesdropping noise guests living courtyard definitely stay hôtel des carmes reserve ahead esp holiday periods popular
